attributes.action: Schools to use local suppliers & manufacturers for uniforms
attributes.additional_details:
8.2 million children in England x £200 for school uniform = 1.64 BILLION POUNDS that should be going into the our economy which keeps people in jobs.
Sign this petition to the Government so that they can legislate schools in line with other statutory and funded service providers to apply The Green Code to their own procurement and the purchasing they enforce on parents particularly school uniform.
